item.description:
Belly Dancing Class with Sabrina Tarulli
Good for any body, any age!
Three weeks – Fridays, January 7, 14, 21
7-8:30 p.m. $60
Class includes
Rhythmic limbering and movement rehearsal
Movement vocabulary break-down
Belly dance isolations and techniques
Props used in performance -- finger cymbals and veils
Please bring your own props if you have them. Wear comfortable dance exercise clothing and plan to dance in bare feet, or soft dance shoes. Fun wear includes skirts or harem pants, cropped half tops and tank tops or decorated bra tops, fringed or coined belts. Bear in mind you won't want to feel hindered while dancing. Please bring your hip belt, veil, and finger cymbals to each class.
Belly Dancer Sabrina is a prominent professional Belly Dancer in the New England area, known for her ability to consistently thrill American and Middle Eastern Audiences with her amazing performances. web site: http://www.bellydance...
 Registration and prepayment required before start of class. Register with Debbie Fox by email: foxfam@aol.com or phone 781-718-6917.
For more info on other programs go to www.AHigherBalance.com
item.name: Belly Dancing!
